Package org.kite9.framework.common

Class Summary
ClassHelp  
FileDiff Compares two files and returns true if they are identical
FSMHelp Provides utility methods for checking that the before states of the FSM are met.
HelpMethods  
RepositoryHelp  
ResourceHelper Commonly you will want to keep test data along with the test java classes in the same directory, since this will make the tests portable accross testing environments.
StackHelp  
TestingHelp Helps with comparing the results of tests
